wikitext.*:
'''The Lord of the Rings''' is a pinball machine by [[wikipedia:Stern (gaming company)|Stern Pinball]]. It is licensed merchandise of [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (film series)]], released in [[2003]]. The creation process of the machine was documented in ''[[wikipedia:How It's Made|How It's Made]]'' episode 9.02.

A limited edition version of the game was released in 2009 with only 500 machines produced.

==Gameplay==
The game has three [[wikipedia:Multiball|multiballs]], named after the three films:
;''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring|The Fellowship of the Ring]]''
*Collect all members of the [[Fellowship of the Ring|Fellowship]] and shoot [[Barad-dûr]] to start. Defeat the cave troll and the [[Durin's Bane|Balrog]] to complete.

;''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers|The Two Towers]]''
*Spell "K-E-E-P" and lock three balls to start. Hit all jackpots to complete.

;''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King|The Return of the King]]''
*Collect 5000 souls on the "Path of the Dead" and shoot [[Orthanc]], Barad-Dûr or Gollum Cave to start. Score all jackpots to complete.

;Other objectives:
* ''Escape the Ringwraiths''
* ''Gandalf vs Saruman''
* ''Warg Battle''
* ''War of the Ents''
* ''Attack of Shelob''
* ''Kill the Witchking''
Completing all lights the bonus mode "There and Back Again".
